name: Meadow
headline: Point of Sale and Compliance SaaS for Cannabis Dispensaries
description: Headquartered in San Francisco since 2014, Meadow builds powerful Point of Sale and eCommerce software for retailers in the legal cannabis industry. Meadow’s all-in-one platform allows dispensaries to sell products, manage menus and inventory, reward customers, dispatch delivery and pick-up orders, and create exceptional in-store experiences for customers. Meadow powers dispensaries and delivery services of all sizes, utilizing technology to maintain compliance with local and state regulations, scale with the Adult Use market, and create operational efficiencies that allow these businesses to thrive in a regulated industry. Meadow’s team is dedicated to making the best retail software in cannabis, and to creating a more collaborative and inclusive legal cannabis industry. To learn more about Meadow, visit getmeadow.com.

founders.name: David Hua, Founder/CEO
founders.description: CEO, Co-Founder of Meadow. Dim Sum Connoisseur. Advocate for Progressive Cannabis. Passionate about Startups.

## Available Across the Country
![The 50 US states, with Michigan, New York, Massachusetts, and New Jersey highlighted in purple.](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2F3q3NKKEufQRjOMDxLLypqO%2F3e8ddd8e494319e26e27204c2746eae1%2Fmeadow-in-america.png&w=3840&q=75)
#### It’s not just a [California](https://getmeadow.com/</california>) thing. Meadow is available in [New York](https://getmeadow.com/</new-york>), [New Jersey](https://getmeadow.com/</new-jersey>), [Massachusetts](https://getmeadow.com/</massachusetts>), [Michigan](https://getmeadow.com/</michigan>), and Washington D.C.—with more states to come.

#### Meadow does it all— _and then some_. Our carefully curated [integration partners](https://getmeadow.com/</integrations>) help you operate your dispensary at an even higher level.
## You don’t have to deal with compliance audits, constant turnover and a broken backend
#### Running your dispensary shouldn’t leave you permanently stressed out.Meadow is built to make running your cannabis business seamless.
## “In 10 years in the business, Meadow is the best business platform I’ve ever used.”
Meadow gives you **a single source of truth** to manage sales channels, inventory and compliance – and make running your dispensary simple and intuitive.
  * [Point of Sale](https://getmeadow.com/<#Point of Sale>)
Become your customers' go-to dispensary
Deliver personalized buying experiences that delight your buyers every time. Manage in-store, online, delivery, and pick-up sales from one dashboard to deliver exceptional service everywhere customers buy.
  * [Inventory](https://getmeadow.com/<#Inventory>)
  * [Delivery](https://getmeadow.com/<#Delivery>)
  * [Compliance](https://getmeadow.com/<#Compliance>)
  * [Reporting](https://getmeadow.com/<#Reporting>)
  * [Support](https://getmeadow.com/<#Support>)


![A list of orders in the Meadow admin, including name, when the order was made, and what type of order it is.](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2F7GR4Aic7CH3Xdjm7juruKL%2F1e7ebb49b9bcd6800cc486d20f373919%2Fadmin-orders-list.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Get lightning-fast, always-on support and get hours back every week.
#### Never sit waiting on a chat for 25 minutes again. Get all your questions answered by our team of cannabis retail experts in minutes—so you can get back to business
![In the image, a Meadow representative is engaged in conversation with a dispensary manager inside Dr Greenthumb's dispensary. 
The interaction exemplifies Meadow's commitment to exceptional client support. The representative is seen offering personalized assistance, reflecting Meadow's reputation for industry-leading support. Services such as white glove onboarding, comprehensive team training, Metrc and compliance guidance, troubleshooting, and business growth strategies are highlighted through this genuine, collaborative exchange.](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2F2UcY1pc3VRORsDRlkwTzwg%2F8647f85ac1a433668df14fa2464b6059%2FWebsite_Images__7_.png&w=3840&q=75)
![G2 Badge Users Love Us](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2F3gbzgCpv3BO648oyuxG5Ao%2F67dc7d5f27ff7269f44960215131a26a%2FG2_Badge_Users_Love_Us___3_.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Rated the #1 POS by Dispensary Operators
Trusted by top cannabis retailers to deliver exceptional experiences, Meadow ranks as the #1 cannabis POS on G2. [**See why users love us.**](https://getmeadow.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/meadow-meadow/reviews>)
## Modern dispensaries rely on Meadow to make business growth simple and intuitive
![A black and white image of the Golden Gate Bridge](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2F68PCjtvZay0wJo5Ia0hLNb%2F9ee0d6eee6fda5ec7867a30169374a5d%2Fgrayscale_golden_gate.png&w=3840&q=75)
> Meadow has been integral to everything from checking people in to inventory management and reporting – it’s all very easy to use and intuitive. Meadow makes my life a lot easier as a manager because the interfaces are clean and that keeps each task really simple. Meadow makes it easy to get in, find what I'm looking for and get on with my day.
![Vapor Room Logo](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2FJyojanZJEey65C0ubGeXB%2Feb08d0d682f71d919f0e823ace4a3f09%2Fvapor-room.png&w=3840&q=75)
**Martin Olive**
Owner,
Vapor Room
![A smiling white man with brown hair and a salt and pepper beard, smiling broadly.](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2F7c9Q4rCZUQXvvcQ1y61gTM%2F271f5f43ad9f7607426964ee515b2831%2Fmartin-olive_head-and-shoulders_transparent.png&w=3840&q=75)
[Check out the Case Study ](https://getmeadow.com/</case-studies/vapor-room>)
### Manage your entire dispensary from one easy-to-use platform (yes, really)
Stop jumping back and forth between 17 different tools. With integrated logistics, delivery, and accounting, Meadow handles it all—so you can focus on your customers
![An ipad interface showing a list of products and items in a cart, along with totals and subtotals.](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2F4W2PxMbXFyGqCygidObZXT%2F83185cae0be6bf78f95dc9cb1e4ad49e%2FIMG_0083.PNG&w=3840&q=75)
![A list of orders, their statuses, and their types in Meadow Admin.](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2F56v3BZgGhCqPJsixx3ptZp%2Fe42c73f032229f37863a46397977dfaa%2FLong_orders_list_no_variety_1_.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Meadow POS Premium Customer Analytics Dashboard preview](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2FFPAUiiOQ9Tlc0quDM16L0%2Fb1911514644e23abb7bccfa24c93103e%2FScreenshot_2024-04-22_at_4.17.42_PM.png&w=3840&q=75)
![The Meadow Admin UI showing a list of incoming Metrc Transfers in a table, including packages and amounts.](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2F5vJx9IDE7psCVPjBqY0jmv%2Fb09a9e4da0d561b1f03418b860c2a8dd%2FCreate_PO_from_incoming_transfer.png&w=3840&q=75)
### A simple, intuitive interface everyone will love—from your budtenders to your business manager
Powerful, not overpowering. With Meadow, it’s easy for everyone on your team to stay on top of inventory, compliance, and reporting
![A black and white landscape photo of palm trees and a clear sky](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2F1BkWo1QjPr7qMXynFnSCS7%2Fa9073f9e23fcf96778c2695f362a503b%2Fgrayscale_palm-trees.png&w=3840&q=75)
> Meadow's system made it real easy—from the budtender's standpoint and customer service, all the way to the backend aspect of inventory and purchasing. Having an all-in-one system with Meadow gives you an ease of use that you can't get having to use multiple companies. It's just been a great way to run our business a lot better.
![Coast to Coast Canoga Logo](https://getmeadow.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2F6kwu1u6s8j23%2F32hlUizqa0lzg2lGYMF5sE%2F804b386405645c4b64e4c588d3f2c7db%2Fcoast-to-coast-canoga.png&w=3840&q=75)
**Steven Murray**
Marketing Director,
Coast to Coast

## You could switch platforms again in three months.Or you could switch to Meadow.
Finally get an intuitive, all-in-one business management platform.And make running your dispensary effortless.
✓ Manage your inventory with ease✓ Ensure total, always-on compliance✓ Effortless reporting for smarter choices✓ Get exceptional support in minutes✓ Assisted onboarding for new users

## Available Across the Country

#### It’s not just a California⟨24⟩ thing. Meadow is available in New York⟨25⟩, New Jersey⟨26⟩, Massachusetts⟨27⟩, Michigan⟨28⟩, and Washington D.C.—with more states to come.
## A powerful platform augmented by integrations you already know and love
![Leafly⟨29⟩]
![Metrc⟨30⟩]

#### Meadow does it all— _and then some_. Our carefully curated integration partners⟨42⟩ help you operate your dispensary at an even higher level.
## You don’t have to deal with compliance audits, constant turnover and a broken backend
#### Running your dispensary shouldn’t leave you permanently stressed out.Meadow is built to make running your cannabis business seamless.
## “In 10 years in the business, Meadow is the best business platform I’ve ever used.”
Meadow gives you **a single source of truth** to manage sales channels, inventory and compliance – and make running your dispensary simple and intuitive.
  * Point of Sale⟨43⟩
Become your customers' go-to dispensary
Deliver personalized buying experiences that delight your buyers every time. Manage in-store, online, delivery, and pick-up sales from one dashboard to deliver exceptional service everywhere customers buy.
  * Inventory⟨44⟩
  * Delivery⟨45⟩
  * Compliance⟨46⟩

## Get lightning-fast, always-on support and get hours back every week.
#### Never sit waiting on a chat for 25 minutes again. Get all your questions answered by our team of cannabis retail experts in minutes—so you can get back to business
![In the image, a Meadow representative is engaged in conversation with a dispensary manager inside Dr Greenthumb's dispensary.

## Modern dispensaries rely on Meadow to make business growth simple and intuitive

Meadow makes my life a lot easier as a manager because the interfaces are clean and that keeps each task really simple. Meadow makes it easy to get in, find what I'm looking for and get on with my day.

Stop jumping back and forth between 17 different tools. With integrated logistics, delivery, and accounting, Meadow handles it all—so you can focus on your customers

Having an all-in-one system with Meadow gives you an ease of use that you can't get having to use multiple companies. It's just been a great way to run our business a lot better.

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Meadow

**Name:** Meadow  
**Founded:** 2014  
**Headquarters:** San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size:** 14 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W15  
**Group Partner:** Nan  

**Website:** [getmeadow.com](https://getmeadow.com)

#### Mission
Meadow is dedicated to providing a comprehensive Point of Sale (POS) and compliance software solution for cannabis dispensaries, aiming to streamline operations in a complex and regulated industry.

### What They Do
Meadow offers an all-in-one platform specifically designed for retailers in the legal cannabis space. This platform does the heavy lifting, enabling dispensaries to:

- Sell products effectively.
- Manage menus and inventory seamlessly.
- Reward customers and enhance their shopping experience.
- Handle delivery and pick-up orders with ease.
  
By integrating these functions, Meadow helps dispensaries operate smoothly while ensuring compliance with local and state regulations. Their software is particularly aimed at supporting businesses of all sizes as they scale with the evolving Adult Use market.

### Key Features
1. **Point of Sale:** A user-friendly interface that allows for personalized buying experiences across various sales channels (in-store, online, delivery, and pick-up).
2. **Inventory Management:** Keeps track of stock levels and product performance.
3. **Compliance Tools:** Ensures that dispensaries adhere to legal requirements and minimizes stress related to compliance audits.
4. **Customer Support:** Features include rapid response times and assistance from industry experts, making sure dispensary operators can focus on their customers rather than software issues.

### Reach and Impact
Meadow is not just limited to California; their services are available in several key states including New York, New Jersey, Massachusetts, and Michigan. This geographic expansion reflects their commitment to adapting to the growing demands of the cannabis industry.

### Customer Trust
They have established a strong reputation among dispensary operators, being rated as the #1 cannabis POS on platforms like G2. Their robust integration capabilities with popular tools—like Leafly, Weedmaps, and QuickBooks—enhance operational efficiency and user satisfaction.

### Culture and Values
Meadow prides itself on fostering a collaborative and inclusive environment in the cannabis industry. Their team is motivated by the shared goal of revolutionizing cannabis retail through technology.

---

In a nutshell, Meadow is about simplifying and enhancing cannabis retail management—making it more intuitive, efficient, and compliant. If you're in the cannabis industry looking for a robust solution, you might want to give Meadow a serious look.
